titles.title: Study on Improving Lands Act
Study on Improving Lands Act
To require the Secretary of Agriculture to direct a study on soil health of Federal lands, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Study on Improving Lands Act
This bill requires the Department of Agriculture to (1) direct a study on the state of soil health on federal lands that determines impacts such as grazing, wildfire, recreation, and invasive species; and (2) create a database of the information collected during the study.
